SqlQuery.Data: SELECT exclude.id as id, IFNULL(exclude.sig_id,0) as sig_id, IFNULL(cast(inet_ntoa(ip_src) as char(15)), 0) as ip_src, IFNULL(port_src, 0) as port_src, IFNULL(cast(inet_ntoa(ip_dst) as char(15)), 0) as ip_dst, IFNULL(port_dst, 0) as port_dst, IFNULL(ip_proto, 0) as ip_proto, IFNULL(exclude.fp,0) as fp, IFNULL(comment,'') as comment, IFNULL(signature.sig_name,'') as sig_name, IFNULL(signature.sig_sid, 0) as sig_sid, exclude.timeadded as timestamp FROM exclude LEFT JOIN signature ON (signature.sig_id = exclude.sig_id)
